t: Chris Rea / New Light Through Old Windows – SuperDeluxeEdition
s: Chris Rea’s 1988 compilation, New Light Through Old Windows, will be reissued in June. The ‘best of’ was unusual in that Rea re-recorded most of the songs (hence the title) and it also featured a brand new song called ‘Working On It’.

t: Amazon.com: Best of Chris Rea: CDs & Vinyl
s: Just discovered Chris Rea on an Amazon Christmas playlist with "Driving Home For Christmas". I then realized that he is the artist on "Fool if You Think Its Over", which I've always liked. Where has he been all my life? What a great voice that covers all genres of music - R&B, Country, Rock, ...

Great collection of songs. Gave it to Friens as presents. My mother listen to in every morning. I enlarged copy of printed Lorina for my mother and it helps her to learn English and lyrics. We love Chris Rea and wish him good health!

t: REA,CHRIS - Original Album Series | Amazon.com.au | Music
s: Chris Rea a été surtout connu pour la chanson Fool ( if you think it’s over ) sa chanson fétiche. Il en a écrit d’autres aussi bonnes et si vous ne le connaissez pas, il serait temps de le découvrir. Je suis choyé par cet ensemble de cds.
